gov.nasa.arc.mct.util
Interface BatchLoader

All Known Implementing Classes:
BatchLoaderImpl
public interface BatchLoader

Interface for loading telemetry into MCT database.

createConnection

java.sql.Connection createConnection(java.lang.String dbname,
                                     java.lang.String host,
                                     java.lang.String port,
                                     java.lang.String user,
                                     java.lang.String passwd,
                                     boolean profileSQL)
                                     throws java.sql.SQLException,
                                            java.lang.ClassNotFoundException
Opens a database connection.

Parameters:
dbname - dbname
host - host
port - port
user - dbuser
passwd - dbuser's password
profileSQL - optional for debugging
Returns:
the connection
Throws:
java.sql.SQLException - upon db error
java.lang.ClassNotFoundException - upon jdbc class not found error

                                   throws java.lang.Exception

Parameters:
connection - the database connection
Throws:
java.lang.Exception - if invalid

persistTaxonomies

void persistTaxonomies(java.sql.Connection connection,
                       java.util.Collection<java.lang.String> taxonomyPaths)
                       throws java.lang.Exception
Given a collection of taxonomy paths, persists each new path if it has not already been persisted. The pathnames are fully qualified.

Parameters:
connection - the database connection
taxonomyPaths - collection of taxonomy paths
Throws:
java.lang.Exception - upon error

persistParameters

void persistParameters(java.sql.Connection connection,
                       java.lang.Class<? extends AbstractComponent> componentType,
                       java.lang.String parentKey,
                       java.util.Collection<ParameterInfo> newSymbols)
                       throws java.lang.Exception
Given a collection of symbols, persists each symbol to its parent taxonomy node.

Parameters:
connection - the database connection
componentType - the MCT component type to persist
parentKey - the parent node
newSymbols - the collection of symbols
Throws:
java.lang.Exception - upon error
